translations.translation: It is simply a reminder to all the worlds.
This is only a warning for mankind.
This is nothing but an Admonition for all people the world over.
It, (the Quran), is nothing but a reminder to you from the Lord of the Universe.
“It is not but an advice for the entire world.”
It is only a Reminder for all the creatures."
It is nothing but a reminder to the nations;
It is nothing but a reminder unto all beings,
Lo! it is naught else than a reminder for all peoples
this is simply an admonition to mankind,
It is naught but an admonition Unto the worlds.
It is just a reminder for all the nations,
This is no less than a Message to (all) the Worlds.
It (this Quran) is only a Reminder for all the 'Alamin (mankind and jinns).
This is nothing else but a reminder to all the worlds,
It is but a reminder to mankind.
It is but a reminder to the worlds.
[38:87] It is only, in other words, the Qur’ān is only, a reminder, an admonition, for all worlds, [those of] humans, jinn and [other] rational beings, [but] excluding the angels.
(Lo! It) i.e. the Qur'an (is naught else than a reminder) an admonition (for all peoples) for the jinn and human beings.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: بل { إِنْ هُوَ } أي: ما هذا القرآن المنزل علي { إِلاَّ ذِكْرٌ } أي: عظة وتذكير { لِّلْعَالَمِينَ } [ص: 87] من الثقلين المكلفين بالهداية والإيمان والتوحيد والعرفان

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text: { إِن هو }: ما هو { إِلا ذِكْرٌ }: وعظ من الله عزّ وجل { للعالَمين } الثقلين كافة
